Function Documentation

void I2S_ClearFlag ( u32  I2S_Flag)

Clear the specified I2S flag.

Parameters:
I2S_Flag,:specify the flag that is to be cleared. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_TRI : I2S Tx FIFO trigger level flag
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_UV : I2S Tx FIFO underflow flag
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_OV : I2S Tx FIFO overflow flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_TRI : I2S Rx FIFO trigger level flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_UV : I2S Rx FIFO underflow flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_OV : I2S Rx FIFO overflow flag
Return values:
None

Definition at line 204 of file ht32f5xxxx_i2s.c.

u8 I2S_GetFIFOStatus ( u32  I2S_FIFO)

Return the status of specified I2S FIFO.

Parameters:
I2S_FIFO,:specify the FIFO that is to be checked. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • I2S_TX_FIFO : I2S Tx FIFO
  • I2S_RX_FIFO : I2S Rx FIFO
Return values:
Thenumber of data in specified I2S FIFO.

Definition at line 228 of file ht32f5xxxx_i2s.c.

FlagStatus I2S_GetFlagStatus ( u32  I2S_Flag)

Check whether the specified I2S flag has been set or not.

Parameters:
I2S_Flag,:specify the flag that is to be check. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_TRI : I2S Tx FIFO trigger level flag
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_UDF : I2S Tx FIFO underflow flag
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_OVF : I2S Tx FIFO overflow flag
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_EMP : I2S Tx FIFO empty flag
  • I2S_FLAG_TXFIFO_FUL : I2S Tx FIFO full flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_TRI : I2S Rx FIFO trigger level flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_UDF : I2S Rx FIFO underflow flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_OVF : I2S Rx FIFO overflow flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_EMP : I2S Rx FIFO empty flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RXFIFO_FUL : I2S Rx FIFO full flag
  • I2S_FLAG_RIGHT_CH : I2S right channel flag
  • I2S_FLAG_TX_BUSY : I2S Tx busy flag
  • I2S_FLAG_CLK_RDY : I2S clock ready flag
Return values:
SETor RESET

Definition at line 79 of file ht32f5xxxx_i2s.c.

void I2S_IntConfig ( u32  I2S_Int,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the I2S interrupt.

Parameters:
I2S_Int,:specify if the I2S interrupt source to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • I2S_INT_TXFIFO_TRI : I2S Tx FIFO trigger level interrupt
  • I2S_INT_TXFIFO_UF : I2S Rx FIFO underflow interrupt
  • I2S_INT_TXFIFO_OV : I2S Tx FIFO overflow interrupt
  • I2S_INT_RXFIFO_TRI : I2S Rx FIFO trigger level interrupt
  • I2S_INT_RXFIFO_UV : I2S Rx FIFO underflow interrupt
  • I2S_INT_RXFIFO_OV : I2S Rx FIFO overflow interrupt
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

void I2S_MclkOutputCmd ( ControlStatus  NewState)
void I2S_PDMACmd ( u32  I2S_PDMAREQ,
ControlStatus  NewState 
)

Enable or Disable the I2S PDMA interface.

Parameters:
I2S_PDMAREQ,:specify the I2S PDMA transfer request to be enabled or disabled. This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
  • I2S_PDMAREQ_TX : Tx PDMA transfer request
  • I2S_PDMAREQ_RX : Rx PDMA transfer request
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None
